== Nedumpura (CT) (627758) ==

Nedumpura (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 12.91 sq. km. and harbouring 2645 households with total population of 12399 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 33 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 313 km. Male population is 5929 and female population is 6470. Scheduled Caste population is 1196 and Scheduled Tribes population is 8. Census Location Code of the town is 627758<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 33 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 113 km. Railway station is at Vallathol nagar at a distance of 3 km.
